title: FS: 19th C. baseball themed trade card
author: edhans

posts.post_title: FS: 19th C. baseball themed trade card
posts.post_content: Cool old trade card for sale $70.00 delivered. Solid VG, with no major flaws. Check or money order only. No electronic payments. New York residents must add sales tax. Please reserve via email [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. No PMs, please. As always, "I'll take it" trumps requests for additional scans or discounts. First come, first served. Please view my updated website below. Thank you for looking.
